title: Spack continues installation even if dependent package install failed
body:
This doesn't happen frequently and hence difficult to reproduce. But here is one example where dependent package `SecondPkg ` failed and spack continues to install `FirstPkg `:

```bash
spack install  --dirty -v FirstPkg@xx +mpi %gcc '^mvapich2'
==> Installing FirstPkg
==> Installing SecondPkg
==> Trying to fetch from file:///somepath/spack/var/spack/cache/SecondPkg/SecondPkg-develop.tar.gz
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /somepath/spack/var/spack/cache/SecondPkg/SecondPkg-develop.tar.gz
==> Fetching from file:///somepath/spack/var/spack/cache/SecondPkg/SecondPkg-develop.tar.gz failed.
==> Already fetched /somepath/spack/var/spack/stage/SecondPkg-develop-ji22ax2cxbni4lrwop44jizxetkq4ldi/SecondPkg
==> No checksum needed when fetching with git
==> Already staged SecondPkg-develop-ji22ax2cxbni4lrwop44jizxetkq4ldi in /somepath/spack/var/spack/stage/SecondPkg-develop-ji22ax2cxbni4lrwop44jizxetkq4ldi
==> No patches needed for SecondPkg
==> Building SecondPkg [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[2]: *** [apps/CMakeFiles/SecondPkgwriter.dir/writer.cpp.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [apps/CMakeFiles/SecondPkgwriter.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
==> Trying to fetch from file:///somepath/spack/var/spack/cache/FirstPkg/FirstPkg-hdf.tar.gz
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /somepath/spack/var/spack/cache/FirstPkg/FirstPkg-hdf.tar.gz
==> Fetching from file:///somepath/spack/var/spack/cache/FirstPkg/FirstPkg-hdf.tar.gz failed.
==> Already fetched /somepath/spack/var/spack/stage/FirstPkg-hdf-x4b5hrcjjt3jjrq2udv4hd4no6jhfpja/FirstPkg
==> No checksum needed when fetching with git
==> Already staged FirstPkg-hdf-x4b5hrcjjt3jjrq2udv4hd4no6jhfpja in /somepath/spack/var/spack/stage/FirstPkg-hdf-x4b5hrcjjt3jjrq2udv4hd4no6jhfpja
==> No patches needed for FirstPkg
==> Building FirstPkg [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
<bound method FirstPkg.install of <spack.pkg.bbp.FirstPkg.FirstPkg object at 0x2521fd0>>
==> 'cmake' '..' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=
……..
```
